label: Khaustov, Alexandr A.  2016. New species and a record of myrmecophilous mites of the families  Neopygmephoridae and Microdispidae (Acari: Heterostigmatina:  Pygmephoroidea) associated with Lasius umbratus (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Western Siberia, Russia. Zootaxa 4137(3): 375–390.
value: Khaustov, Alexandr A.  2016. New species and a record of myrmecophilous mites of the families  Neopygmephoridae and Microdispidae (Acari: Heterostigmatina:  Pygmephoroidea) associated with Lasius umbratus (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Western Siberia, Russia. Zootaxa 4137(3): 375–390.
